Regarding the bad things some priests have done, I do not think the church could have stopped them. Some married men become bad. They still like young children.

Marriage would not have stopped them. It is the person, not marriage.

Some religions allow priests to marry. If someone wants to be married and a priest, they should join a different church.

I think people are born that way. It is in their genes. It is not how they are raised.

The church should not cover up bad things. It is wrong. I do not think they always knew about the bad things.

I was ok with the idea at first.  But many people were sad about the September 11 attacks. We went to war in Iraq. The Bush group said the war was about Osama Bin Laden. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons. This is not true. This makes me angry. 

The Bush group lied to people. Colin Powell said he was not sure about the proof. He gave a talk at the United Nations. This is wrong. It is bad for a leader to lie.

The Bush group does not like the rules of the country. They want to change them. I think they wanted to go to war.  A man in the money group said this in his book. 

The younger Bush wanted to fight Saddam Hussein. His father had a problem with him. The young Bush also wanted more oil. This is not fair.

The war has gone on too long.  It is bad to leave now. Iraq might have a war. More people might die.

The United Nations wants other countries to help. They want Syria and Saudi Arabia to help. This might cause problems. Iraq wants to be free.

The government is weak. The leader does not have control.  A man named Mugtada al-Sadr is in the government. He was fighting with us.

The government is very messy. Many groups want power.

The war in Iraq is hard. I do not know much about it.

I think it is not a good war.

We went to Iraq because we think they did the bad things on nine eleven.

But I do not think it is right to stay in Iraq. It is hard to make democracy. It takes time.

If we leave, Iraq will be sad. They will have to start over.

It is bad for both sides.

I think we should help Iraq, but it is hard.

We use guns to show we are strong. I think we should not use guns.

We did not say we would fight a war.

We should help Iraq, but it is hard. Many people are sad.

We need to think about what is best for Iraq and the United States.

I think it is wrong for the government to make a law about this. The Constitution says the church and the state should be separate.  It is clear. The government should not try to control what the church does.

Some people want to make this illegal. They like one church's ideas better than others. 

Many Catholics and Christians do not like this. 

The government should not say what the church can and cannot do.

The Constitution protects religious freedom. It is important for people to have different beliefs. 

Making a new law about this would be wrong. It would be like the government controlling people instead of the other way around. 

The government should not be involved in this issue. 

The person who wants to make this illegal may be doing it because he does not like it. He may like one religion more than others.

It is up to the church to decide.

I do not think this law would help the country. It may even help.

The war in Iraq was hard. The government did not tell the people the full truth about why we went to war. They said the war was about the attacks on September 11th. This was not true. The government used the people's fear to start the war.  

I am against war. I do not like the idea of fighting first. The war in Iraq was like the war in Vietnam. The government did not learn from the past.

Many American soldiers died. They went to Iraq to change the government. 

The government was not ready for what happened after the war. There was a lot of trouble. The United States tried to make a new government, but this was hard.

The United States tried to do the same thing in Vietnam. They wanted to stop Communism. This was hard too. 

The war in Iraq will be a long fight. It is hard to win when you are fighting the people in a country.

The government should have planned better. They did not know it would be so hard. The war is still going on.

The war in Iraq is a difficult problem. We went there, and now it is hard to leave.

I am for gay marriage. I always have been. I think it is a personal choice. Many people say it is in your genes. This is not something people can control. To take away rights from people because of this is unfair. 

I think this is wrong. I want the government to stay out of this. It is a personal matter. It is about families. 

There are gay couples in my neighborhood. They are happy. They walk their dogs. They are like other families.

I do not like how some people want to control who can marry. Marriage is a personal thing. 

Many experts say that being gay is in your genes. It is not a choice. 

Gay marriage should be private. No one should have to tell anyone else.

The web is for every one.  What you put on the web is public.  It can be seen by many people.  

I am a Resident Assistant.  I have seen this.  If you say bad things on the web, it can hurt you.  People will think bad things about you.  If you say you want to hurt people, someone will tell.

The web is seen by many.  If your friend sees it, they will tell the school.  The school must act.  They must keep people safe.

It is hard to know what is real on the web.  Some people joke.  But some jokes can be bad.

A friend saw some things on Facebook.  He was worried.  The things were not funny.

When you put things on the web, it is not a secret.  If you do not want people to see it, do not put it on the web.

The war has gone on for too long. At first, the goal was good. The goal was to help people have a fair government. But now, I think we are fighting for other reasons. Maybe we want to show we are strong. 

I think the reasons for the war were not good at the start. The president's father had problems with Saddam Hussein. 

If the goal was to help people have a fair government, that is good. But if there were other reasons, it was not fair. 

We showed our power when we started the war. But it has been many years. This is too long. 

If our goal was to help people who did not have a fair government, that is a good reason to fight. But now our reasons are unclear. It seems like we are fighting just to keep fighting. 

We need to end the war. The people there must take care of themselves. We have spent too much money on this war. We need to use the money for our own problems, like poverty. 

We have many problems at home. We need to spend money on schools, roads, and health care. It is wrong to spend money on war when we have so many problems at home.

Can you tell me more? I want to know why someone could not have a Myspace.

It is good that someone saw the bad plan. They saved a life. 

Not all people are bad. It is not right to look at everyone's Myspace. 

I use Facebook. It makes me sad that bad people can see my things.

Bad people want to know about you. They can find your name, your school, and your friends. They can ask to meet you.

I only talk to people I know on Facebook. I try to keep my things private. 

It is hard to use Facebook. You want to talk to your friends, but it is not safe.


My friend told me her high school banned Myspace. I do not know if that is right.

This is true for the United States, Iraq, and the world.  Many U.S. soldiers think the war was bad. They want to go home. 

The war has been bad from the start.  It will be bad to leave. The Middle East is hard to understand.

The United States and the Middle East are very different. The United States wants to bring democracy to the Middle East. This is not good.

Saddam was a bad man.  But we should not invade a country.  This makes things worse. We are stuck in Iraq.

I do not know why we should stay.  The government has ideas. I do not agree.  

They say we should leave slowly. Maybe this is okay.  I want us to leave now. 

Most Iraqis want us to leave. They know what is best.  If we ask them, they will say yes.  Then we are not to blame if things go wrong. 

We will never be good guys in the Middle East.  But leaving is better than staying.

Yes, I think gender is still a problem in the United States. It is not only a problem for women. It is a problem for men too.

Women may have a hard time at work. There is a "glass ceiling."  This means that even when women are equal, some men find it hard to work for a woman. This is because of how people have always done things.

Women may have the skills for a job. But a board may not choose her because she is a woman. People think women are not good at business.

The same thing can happen to men. For example, it is not usual for men to stay home with children. Some people think this is wrong. They think men should work and make money.

In the fashion world, some people may not take a man seriously if he is straight.  This is because people think fashion is for women.

In many jobs, there is still gender discrimination. To change this is hard. People have old ideas. Things are better now than they were long ago, but change is slow.

Women are getting better jobs. More women are CEOs.  More people accept this. More men stay home with their children. This is good.

We must show the good qualities of people who are different. We must not be too pushy. If we force change, people will resist. Change is happening. 

People may also be discriminated against because of where they are from. Sometimes people judge others by their grammar. This is not fair.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less bad. It is not a crime now. It is more like a traffic ticket. You get a fine. This is good for jobs. When people have a drug charge, it is hard to get a job. 

Some people think that decriminalization is not enough. They worry about the future. Even if it is not a crime, it can still be hard to get jobs and do other things. 

It costs a lot of money to arrest people. It costs money to keep them in jail. It costs money for lawyers. Denver is a city that is open to new ideas. They think it is good to save money. They can use the money for schools and help for old people. 

Marijuana is still not good for everyone. Some people think it is bad for your health. Some people think it is bad for society. 

Marijuana is still not legal like alcohol. People do not use it in public much. Some people think this is good. 

Alcohol is bad for your body. Marijuana is bad for your life. Everyone is different. Some people can use things like marijuana and alcohol safely. Other people can't.

Yes, I would say yes. The Church has old ways. It is good to keep some old ways. But it is also good to change. Some Catholics must go to Church every week. The Church has strong rules. Sometimes, I think the Church looks down on people who do not follow all the rules. The Church does not like people who are not perfect Catholics. The Church does not like people of other religions. 

My father was not Catholic. My mother was Catholic. The Church would not marry them. This is not being nice to other religions. We learn to love all people. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say love others and then not accept them.

The Church tells people to do things. But the way the Church acts is different. The Church is old. They keep the old ways.

I think priests should be able to marry. But this will not stop bad people. Bad people will do bad things.

I do not think allowing priests to marry will stop bad people from hurting children.

This is a hard subject. I am not sure what I think. I think it is a hard problem for many people. The law must keep church and state separate.  Marriage is a big idea. It must be clear for all.

Some people think the government should say what is a marriage. Some people think it is a church idea.  The government does not say what religion to have. The government does not say if people are baptized.  If you are married, the government should see it as a civil union.  It is two people.  

If all states agree, it should be a law for all states.  It is wrong to change the Constitution to say no to gay marriage.  The Constitution is for big ideas.  This is a big idea for some people, but not big enough to change the Constitution.

I do not agree with this life. But I think it should be legal. It is not a big issue for the country. Each state should decide.

If you live in a state that legalizes gay marriage, you know the state's view. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people.  

I think gay marriage should be legal in each state.

I do not think the president should say all states must ban gay marriage. Each state should decide.

The president does not live in every state. He should not tell states what to do.

Some things are better left to each state. The president will not be in office forever.

A new president may change the law. It is better to let each state decide. They live there.

School officials want to keep students safe.

Yes, I think gender is still a problem in the United States. It is not only a problem for women. It is a problem for men too.

Women may have a hard time at work. There is a "glass ceiling."  This means that even when women are equal, some men find it hard to work for a woman. This is because of how people have always done things.

Women may have the skills for a job. But a board may not choose her because she is a woman. People think women are not good at business.

The same thing can happen to men. For example, it is not usual for men to stay home with children. Some people think this is wrong. They think men should work and make money.

In the fashion world, some people may not take a man seriously if he is straight.  This is because people think fashion is for women.

In many jobs, there is still gender discrimination. To change this is hard. People have old ideas. Things are better now than they were long ago, but change is slow.

Women are getting better jobs. More women are CEOs.  More people accept this. More men stay home with their children. This is good.

We must show the good qualities of people who are different. We must not be too pushy. If we force change, people will resist. Change is happening. 

People may also be discriminated against because of where they are from. Sometimes people judge others by their grammar. This is not fair.

They did not make marijuana legal. They made it less bad. It is not a crime now. It is more like a traffic ticket. You get a fine. This is good for jobs. When people have a drug charge, it is hard to get a job. 

Some people think that decriminalization is not enough. They worry about the future. Even if it is not a crime, it can still be hard to get jobs and do other things. 

It costs a lot of money to arrest people. It costs money to keep them in jail. It costs money for lawyers. Denver is a city that is open to new ideas. They think it is good to save money. They can use the money for schools and help for old people. 

Marijuana is still not good for everyone. Some people think it is bad for your health. Some people think it is bad for society. 

Marijuana is still not legal like alcohol. People do not use it in public much. Some people think this is good. 

Alcohol is bad for your body. Marijuana is bad for your life. Everyone is different. Some people can use things like marijuana and alcohol safely. Other people can't.

Yes, I would say yes. The Church has old ways. It is good to keep some old ways. But it is also good to change. Some Catholics must go to Church every week. The Church has strong rules. Sometimes, I think the Church looks down on people who do not follow all the rules. The Church does not like people who are not perfect Catholics. The Church does not like people of other religions. 

My father was not Catholic. My mother was Catholic. The Church would not marry them. This is not being nice to other religions. We learn to love all people. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say love others and then not accept them.

The Church tells people to do things. But the way the Church acts is different. The Church is old. They keep the old ways.

I think priests should be able to marry. But this will not stop bad people. Bad people will do bad things.

I do not think allowing priests to marry will stop bad people from hurting children.

This is a hard subject. I am not sure what I think. I think it is a hard problem for many people. The law must keep church and state separate.  Marriage is a big idea. It must be clear for all.

Some people think the government should say what is a marriage. Some people think it is a church idea.  The government does not say what religion to have. The government does not say if people are baptized.  If you are married, the government should see it as a civil union.  It is two people.  

If all states agree, it should be a law for all states.  It is wrong to change the Constitution to say no to gay marriage.  The Constitution is for big ideas.  This is a big idea for some people, but not big enough to change the Constitution.

I grew up in a home with Christian beliefs.  I have many gay friends. 

I do not agree with this life. But I think it should be legal. It is not a big issue for the country. Each state should decide.

Some states are democratic. Some are republican. Democratic states want gay marriage. People in these states know how the state feels.

If you live in a state that legalizes gay marriage, you know the state's view. You chose to live there.

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people.  

I think gay marriage should be legal in each state.

I do not think the president should say all states must ban gay marriage. Each state should decide.

The president does not live in every state. He should not tell states what to do.

Some things are better left to each state. The president will not be in office forever.

A new president may change the law. It is better to let each state decide. They live there.

Myspace is for the public. People can see what you put there. If you put things on the internet, you must know people will see them. This includes school officials.  

School officials have the right to see what students post on Myspace. They can see it even at home. They want to keep students safe.  

It is good to be safe. If the school sees something bad on Myspace, they can help. They can stop a bad thing from happening.

It is wrong to go on Myspace just to look for bad things. But if the school sees something that helps them keep students safe, that is okay. 

Parents want their children to be safe at school. Schools do many things to keep students safe. They practice for bad things. They do this to help keep students safe from bad things like school shootings. 

School officials want to keep students safe.

Nine eleven changed me. I want to fight back. I was for the war at first. I felt angry. I did not think about the long time. We went to war without a plan. It was a bad idea.

Now, I am against the war. I do not think it is working. The people there fight each other. They will not be our friends.

We went there unprepared. We did not know what to expect. War is very different there. They are savage. I think they just want us to leave. 

We should leave. We were angry. We did not think clearly.  We wanted revenge. The President wanted to go to war.

We had to do something after nine eleven. But we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do. We were not united.

We cannot change them. They are always going to be like this. We are hurting ourselves by staying. We should leave.
